name: 16 Balls: Pocket PachinGo!
summary:
16 Balls Pocket Pachingo will test your skill and luck to hit all the 16 lights or form patterns to get bonuses! How much can you push your luck to get big epic winnings?!
The game lets you play as Benjo who secretly adores a sweet girl named Michelle a frequent visitor of the local arcade. Benjo noticed Michelle's adoration of stuff toys. Benjo happens to be a master of 16 Balls Bingo Pachinko game where you can convert your winnings to cute stuff toys ranging from Bears to Turtles to Penguins. He saw an opportunity to bag all prizes and strike a conversation with his crush! Can you do it?!
